title: Ask Crystal: How can I budget when I’m so far behind?
description: Every Thursday in 2025, I’ll be answering a question on money and/or budgeting. If you have a question you’d love for me to answer in an upcoming post, please submit it here. Today’s question is from Rachael: I am so behind on my regular monthly bills, like my electric, rent, and water so every time IRead More
author: Crystal Paine
